formElement.label: Configuration:
formElement.documentation: This parameter must have the name of the configuration created in the "Plugin Configuration Parameters" section for this plugin.

formElement.label: SVN command line utility:
formElement.documentation: Absolute path to the svn command line tool.

formElement.label: SVN Working Directory:
formElement.documentation: Path to the existing svn working copy to update.

formElement.label: Revision:
formElement.documentation: Provide an specific revision to update to.
